org.cougaar.mts.base
Class SendLinkImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.mts.base.SendLinkImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SendLink
public final class SendLinkImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SendLink

The only implementation of SendLink, instantiated once per MessageTransportClient. It's main job is simply to place outgoing messages on the (singleton) SendQueue.

Method Summary

Method Detail

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(AttributedMessage message)
Description copied from interface: SendLink
Validates the originator and add the message to the SendQueue, thereby ending the call sequence from the caller's point of view. Invoked from the MessageTransportService impl class method of the same name, which will have already wrapped the original message in an AttributedMessage, using the original message target address's attributes.

Specified by:
sendMessage in interface SendLink
Parameters:
message - The AttributedMessage to be sent.
See Also:
SendQueue.sendMessage(AttributedMessage), MessageTransportService.sendMessage(Message)

flushMessages

public void flushMessages(java.util.List<Message> droppedMessages)
Description copied from interface: SendLink
Causes any queued or pending messages from the address associated with the SendLink to be removed from the queues, The list of flushed messages is returned in the supplied ArrayList.

Specified by:
flushMessages in interface SendLink
Parameters:
droppedMessages - Dropped messages are added to this list.
See Also:
MessageTransportService.flushMessages()

getAddress

public MessageAddress getAddress()
Description copied from interface: SendLink
Returns the MessageAddress that this SendLink is associated with.

Specified by:
getAddress in interface SendLink

release

public void release()
Description copied from interface: SendLink
Releases hooks into the MTS and invalidates the SendLink. Called when the MessageTransportService is released by the MessageTransportClient associated with this SendLink.

Specified by:
release in interface SendLink

okToSend

public boolean okToSend(AttributedMessage message)
Description copied from interface: SendLink
Returns true if it is possible to send message. SendLinkImpl only checks that the target MessageAddress is properly formed and release() has not been called.

Specified by:
okToSend in interface SendLink
Parameters:
message - The message to should be checked for validity.
See Also:
MessageTransportService.sendMessage(Message)
